page.title: 04Another farm in our area.
page.content: The farm belongs to{Mr Billings}and is mainly a dairy farm.{Mr Billings has been farming here 16 years.He has 300 acres which include grass lettings {Mr Billings}has mainly livestock but does have some crops which include wheat and grass.He has 300 cows.Most of them are milking cows.He has 60 bulls which go for beef and 120 heifers.He has 4 tractors 1 combine harvester,7 trailers,1 plough,1 drill and some other machines.He would keep a cow until it was 8 years old.He feeds the cows grass silage and cattle cake, which is a diet of food given to cows when they are being milked.He has Friesian cows and 1 bull to put the cows in calf.He uses artificial insemination on the rest of the cows. Land costs Â£2000 per acre.He has 2 part time workers and 2 full time men who earn about Â£8000 a year.
